## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/vectorinfo">VectorInfo</a> stores abstract the following information for each vector element:

1) The memory address loaded into the element as <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/polynomial">Polynomial</a> 2) a set of load instruction necessary to construct the vector, 3) a set of all other instructions that are necessary to create the vector and 4) a pointer value that can be used as relative base for all elements.

Definition at line 635 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp">InterleavedLoadCombinePass.cpp</a>.

### computeFromSVI() {#a512a96bc40ecd933dab9e74af6be51b0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;InterleavedLoadCombinePass.cpp&#125;::VectorInfo::computeFromSVI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shufflevectorinst">ShuffleVectorInst</a> &#42; SVI, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp-/vectorinfo">VectorInfo</a> &amp; Result, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp; DL)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shufflevectorinst">ShuffleVectorInst</a> specialization to compute vector information.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="SVI"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shufflevectorinst">ShuffleVectorInst</a> to operate on</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Result">Result of the computation</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
Compute the left and the right side vector information and merge them by applying the shuffle operation. This function also ensures that the left and right side have compatible loads. This means that all loads are with in the same basic block and are based on the same pointer.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
false if no sensible information can be gathered.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp/#l00786">786</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/interleavedloadcombinepass-cpp">InterleavedLoadCombinePass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
